name: z-ring
effect: Allows the player's Pokémon to use Z-moves.
short_effect: Allows the player's Pokémon to use Z-moves.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A mysterious ring that enables Pokémon to use
Z-Power. It requires both the willpower and
the physical power of the Trainer wearing it.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
A mysterious ring that enables Pokémon to use
Z-Power. It requires both the willpower and
the physical power of the Trainer wearing it.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
